Jameson Arnett

Like your average nerd, building computers, existing online, and finding solutions to my boredom became everday mundane tasks.
I was always sure that I wanted to work "in tech". I just could never really put my finger on what that was until I started to learn to code.

From sharing a family PC, to building a life from my laptop, I've been hooked!
Currently I am a junior CS student at Colorado State University Global.
I am currently most interested in working with new web technologies. Always searching to learn something new, I have been using React and Three.js most recently.
